**2022-05-11 / @rsc, @ianlancetaylor, @griesemer, @bradfitz, @andybons, @spf13**

**Accepted**

- **cmd/cover: extend coverage testing to include applications** [#51430](https://golang.org/issue/51430)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **net/http/httputil: add X-Forwarded-Proto and X-Forwarded-Host by default** [#50465](https://golang.org/issue/50465)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **strings: add CutPrefix and CutSuffix** [#42537](https://golang.org/issue/42537)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **sync: add new Map methods CompareAndSwap, CompareAndDelete, Swap** [#51972](https://golang.org/issue/51972)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **x/sync/errgroup: add TryGo and SetLimit to control concurrency** [#27837](https://golang.org/issue/27837)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **cmd/go: go mod: limit version resolution to packages that are consumed** [#52296](https://golang.org/issue/52296)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **language: allow getting capacity of map?** [#52157](https://golang.org/issue/52157)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**

- **doc: update Go memory model** [#50859](https://golang.org/issue/50859)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **fmt: add FormatString(State) string** [#51668](https://golang.org/issue/51668)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Likely Decline**

- none
